scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp index.html public/index.html && cp favicon.png public/favicon.png && esbuild index.ts --bundle --outfile=public/index.js
scripts.serve: mkdir -p public && cp index.html public/index.html && cp favicon.png public/favicon.png && esbuild index.ts --bundle --watch --outfile=public/index.js
scripts.release: npm run build && rm -rf ../release && mkdir ../release/ && mkdir ../release/cobblequarry && cp -R ./public/* ../release/cobblequarry && deno compile --output ../release/cobble --allow-env --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run ../backend/server.ts && cd ../release/ && zip -r ../cobblequarry.zip *
